name: voice-transcription-app
description: Production-ready voice transcription app with user management and real-time processing

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: npm run install-deps && cd frontend && npm run build && cp -r build ../backend/public
scripts.install-deps: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: Your Name
